scribeocr/scribeocr

Web app for correcting OCR data and creating ebook-style PDFs

Related repos

  • OCR app with PDF processing and document conversion
  • Scans documents to PDF with OCR
  • OCR toolkit with 20+ models for Chinese and English
  • multilingual OCR and document parsing toolkit
  • convert scanned PDFs to markdown or epub with OCR and AI
  • adds OCR text layer to scanned PDFs for searching or copying text
  • Terminal ebook reader with text-to-speech and multi-format support
